section.para: The ngx_http_realip_module module allows to change the client address to the one sent in the specified header field.
This module is not built by default, it should be enabled with the --with-http_realip_module configuration parameter.

directive.name: set_real_ip_from
directive.para: Describes trusted addresses that are known to send correct replacement addresses.

directive.name: real_ip_header
directive.para: Defines a request header field used to send the address for a replacement. In case of the X-Forwarded-For field, the last address in the fieldâ€™s value is used. For other fields the whole value is used.
